
---
title: "getDnsDomainName"
title_tag: "civo.getDnsDomainName"
meta_desc: "Documentation for the civo.getDnsDomainName function with examples, input properties, output properties, and supporting types."

---



<!-- WARNING: this file was generated by Pulumi Docs Generator. -->
<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

Get information on a domain. This data source provides the name and the id.

An error will be raised if the provided domain name is not in your Civo account.
## Schema

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
- **name** (String) The name of the domain


{{% examples %}}

## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}





{{< example csharp >}}

```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Civo = Pulumi.Civo;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var domain = Output.Create(Civo.GetDnsDomainName.InvokeAsync(new Civo.GetDnsDomainNameArgs
        {
            Name = "domain.com",
        }));
        this.DomainOutput = domain.Apply(domain => domain.Name);
        this.DomainIdOutput = domain.Apply(domain => domain.Id);
    }

    [Output("domainOutput")]
    public Output<string> DomainOutput { get; set; }
    [Output("domainIdOutput")]
    public Output<string> DomainIdOutput { get; set; }
}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example go >}}

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-civo/sdk/v2/go/civo"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		opt0 := "domain.com"
		domain, err := civo.LookupDnsDomainName(ctx, &civo.LookupDnsDomainNameArgs{
			Name: &opt0,
		}, nil)
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		ctx.Export("domainOutput", domain.Name)
		ctx.Export("domainIdOutput", domain.Id)
		return nil
	})
}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example python >}}

```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_civo as civo

domain = civo.get_dns_domain_name(name="domain.com")
pulumi.export("domainOutput", domain.name)
pulumi.export("domainIdOutput", domain.id)
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example typescript >}}


```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as civo from "@pulumi/civo";

const domain = civo.getDnsDomainName({
    name: "domain.com",
});
export const domainOutput = domain.then(domain => domain.name);
export const domainIdOutput = domain.then(domain => domain.id);
```
